## ğŸ“‹ Your Three Bugs (Reminder)

### Bug #1: Main Category Tabs Don't Click
- Location: The filter tabs (All, Aurora Core, Infrastructure, Learning, Docs, Config)
- Problem: Clicking them does nothing
- Solution: Debug your JavaScript event listeners
- Hint: Are they actually attached to the tab buttons?

### Bug #2: Statistics Tabs Don't Click
- Location: Top section (Total Changes, Files Added, Files Modified, Lines Added)
- Problem: Stats don't change when you click
- Solution: Same issue as Bug #1 - event handlers
- Hint: Check if these tabs have click handlers at all

### Bug #3: Integration Issue
- Location: Architecture
- Problem: Should be in Aurora UI, not standalone
- Solution: Think about where this belongs in your system
- Hint: Should this be a separate file or part of something larger?
